title: Enhancing Medical Practical Skills: Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies via MOOC-Based Peer Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can improve their mathematical problem-solving process by 80% or more by incorporating peer assessment feedback.
Learners can evaluate peers' problem-solving processes three or more times according to structured peer assessment criteria.
Learners can enhance their mathematical communication skills by two or more levels through peer assessment activities.
Learners can develop self-directed learning plans through the process of accepting and applying feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
